contents.text: Thank you for calling MixMax in San Francisco, your partner in powerful analytics and automation for outbound communications.
For sales and product information, press 1.
For information on our analytics platform and dashboards, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our analytics specialists.

navigationGoals: Get a concise overview of your analytics dashboards and pricing
Understand MixMax analytics dashboard to measure outreach campaign performance
I need an in-depth technical walkthrough of MixMax’s analytics platform APIs and dashboard visualization features.
I’d like to speak with someone about your analytics dashboards and how they work
I need help customizing my analytics dashboard to track campaign metrics.

contents.text: For automation and enhancement feature details, press 2.
One of our product experts will be with you shortly to discuss automation features.

navigationGoals: Learn how your automation features integrate with our CRM workflow
Learn how to set up automated follow-up email sequences with conditional triggers
I want detailed specifications on MixMax’s automation workflows, enhancement features, and integration endpoints.
I want to learn about the automation features you offer
I want to learn how to automate follow-up emails based on recipient behavior.

contents.text: For support and account services, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer your call to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a technical error I’m seeing in the platform
Troubleshoot sync error between MixMax extension and Gmail
I need help troubleshooting a webhook integration error in our outbound campaign analytics.
I need help because the software isn’t working properly
I'm experiencing an error loading my report; can you troubleshoot it?

contents.text: For account management and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please stay on the line and we will connect you to our account services department.

navigationGoals: Update my billing details and request a copy of my latest invoice
Update billing details and ask about veteran discount options
I’d like to adjust my enterprise seat allocation and review the upcoming billing cycle details for my account.
I have a question about my billing and account charges
I need to update my payment method and review my billing statement.
